Name: reflex runner
About the game: reflex runner is a speed running platformer that increases in difficulty as you progress through more than 35 unique levels. the game will test not only your reflexes, but your patience as well. a few rage quits may be in your future. the goal is to clear each level as fast as possible dodging razor sharp saw blades, red hot lasers, shooting flames and much more! the idea behind the game was to create a community of speed runners competing against one another for world record clear times and bragging rights. endure is a separate game mode where the objective is to survive as long as possible as the speed of the machine throwing obstacles at you gradually increases. how to play reflex runner utilizes keyboard controls using either WASD or the arrow keys. it also supports external controllers using the dpad to navigate levels. objective clear levels as fast as possible and with as few deaths as possible. shave down your own personal best times. looking for an even bigger challenge? try to clear every level with 0 deaths!
